# Example Forward Kinematics

Generate a rigid body tree of the Panda robot and run forward kinematics.

```sh
cmake --build --preset "fsb-examples"
cd ./build/debug/examples/body_tree_panda
./fsb_body_tree_panda
```

The output should look like

```text
Body 0 transform:
1.0000 0.0000 0.0000 0.0000
0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 0.0000
0.0000 0.0000 1.0000 0.0000
0 0 0 1

Body 1 transform:
1.0000 0.0000 0.0000 0.0000
0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 0.0000
0.0000 0.0000 1.0000 0.3330
0 0 0 1

Body 2 transform:
0.9553 -0.0000 -0.2955 0.0000
0.0000 1.0000 -0.0000 0.0000
0.2955 0.0000 0.9553 0.3330
0 0 0 1

Body 3 transform:
0.9553 -0.0000 -0.2955 -0.0934
0.0000 1.0000 -0.0000 0.0000
0.2955 0.0000 0.9553 0.6349
0 0 0 1

Body 4 transform:
-0.3233 0.0000 0.9463 -0.0146
0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 0.0000
-0.9463 0.0000 -0.3233 0.6593
0 0 0 1

Body 5 transform:
-0.3233 0.0000 0.9463 0.3755
0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 0.0000
-0.9463 0.0000 -0.3233 0.6132
0 0 0 1

Body 6 transform:
0.9950 -0.0000 -0.0998 0.3755
0.0000 1.0000 -0.0000 0.0000
0.0998 0.0000 0.9950 0.6132
0 0 0 1

Body 7 transform:
0.7003 -0.7068 0.0998 0.4630
-0.7104 -0.7038 -0.0000 0.0000
0.0703 -0.0709 -0.9950 0.6220
0 0 0 1

Body 8 transform:
0.7003 -0.7068 0.0998 0.4737
-0.7104 -0.7038 -0.0000 -0.0000
0.0703 -0.0709 -0.9950 0.5155
0 0 0 1

Jacobian:
0.0000 0.0000 -0.2955 -0.0000 0.9463 0.0000 0.0998
0.0000 1.0000 -0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 1.0000 -0.0000
1.0000 0.0000 0.9553 0.0000 -0.3233 0.0000 -0.9950
0.0000 0.1825 0.0000 -0.1438 -0.0000 -0.0977 0.0000
0.4737 0.0000 0.5065 0.0000 0.0607 0.0000 -0.0000
-0.0000 -0.4737 0.0000 -0.4883 -0.0000 -0.0982 0.0000
```
